Privacy Policy


This privacy policy applies to the Notivation app ("Application") for mobile devices developed by Krista Mae Pabellon ("Service Provider") as a free service. This service is intended for use AS IS.


Information Collection and Use
 The Application may collect information such as: • Your device’s Internet Protocol (IP) address • Pages visited and time spent in the app • Operating system used


The Application does not collect precise location data.


The Service Provider may use this data to provide important updates or improve the app’s functionality.


Personal Information

 The Application may request personally identifiable information, such as name and email. This data is retained and used as described in this policy.
Third-Party Services

 The app uses third-party services that may collect information. These include: • Google Play Services • Google Analytics for Firebase


Please refer to their respective privacy policies.


Data Sharing Your data may be shared: • When required by law • To protect rights, safety, or investigate fraud • With trusted partners who comply with this policy


Opt-Out

 You can stop all information collection by uninstalling the app.
Data Retention

 User data is kept as long as the app is used and for a reasonable time afterward. You may request deletion via email: kristamaepabellon8@gmail.com.
Children

 The Application is not intended for children under 13. If such data is accidentally collected, it will be deleted immediately. Parents may contact the Service Provider for assistance.
Security

 The Service Provider prioritizes the security of your data using reasonable safeguards.
Changes

 This Privacy Policy may be updated from time to time. Continued use of the app constitutes agreement to the updated policy.
Contact

 If you have questions, contact kristamaepabellon8@gmail.com.

Notivation is a minimalist and aesthetic note-taking app designed to help students take smarter notes using AI-powered formatting methods like Cornell, Outline, and Mind Map.


Developed by Krista Mae Pabellon, Notivation allows you to upload notes, process them using AI, and save them as PDF or DOCX files — all while keeping your interface clean and simple.


Key Features: 
• Upload and process your notes with AI 
• Choose your preferred format: Cornell, Outline, Mind Map 
• Save notes as PDF or DOCX 
• View and manage your saved notes
